item.description:
A last minute invite to kayak with us at West Hill Pond in New Hartford! A large,sometimes challenging pond thats lots of fun!!!

Take Rt.8 to the end in Winsted. Turn left onto rt.44 east. Travel 1 mile to West Hill Rd..Turn south onto West Hill Rd. and proceed 1.5 miles. Take your 2nd right to reach boat ramp.
As always, check with mapquest if you have any questions!

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: West Hill Pond-New Hartford Ct.
